articles.title: London reclaims position as Europe’s top trading hub - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The shift back to the City was helped by the return of Swiss share trading in London
articles.content:
London has reclaimed its position as Europes top share trading hub in a boost to the City after it lost its crown to Amsterdam earlier this year.
